naslov: Prodaja - Samostojeća kuća 300 m2 + okućnica 1133 m2 - Vrapče (prodaja)
Mogućnost zamjene: Nije moguća zamjena za drugu nekretninu
opis: Prodaja - Samostojeća kuća 300 m2 + okućnica 1133 m2 - Vrapče Proćećite nekretninom na sljedećem linku: https://my.matterport.com/show/?m=G41r8zZcQ8m Prodajemo samostojeću kuću koju čini prizemlje, kat i tavan te svaki kad može predstavljati posebnu stambenu cjelinu. Tlocrtno kuća ima 78 m2. Pripada joj i pomoćna zgrada koja se koristi kao spremište površine 132 m2. Prizemlje se sastoji od: dnevnog boravka, kuhinje, dvije spavaće sobe i kupaonice. Unutarnjjim stubištem se dolazi na kat koji ima jednak tlocrt kao i prizemlje. Tavan je trenutno neuređen. U prizemlju je grijanje centralno etažno plinsko te je postavljen klima uređaj, a na katu preko peći na drva. Stolarija je PVC. U dvorištu se nalazi garaža, a iza kuće su vrt i voćnjak. Novi krov postavljen je 2010. godine. Idealno za investitore. Autobusna stanica udaljena je svega minutu od zgrade, blizina Crkve, škole, dječjeg vrtića, trgovine. For Sale - Detached House 300 m² + Garden 1133 m² - Vrapče Take a virtual tour of the property at the following link: https://my.matterport.com/show/?m=G41r8zZcQ8m We are selling a detached house consisting of a ground floor, first floor, and attic, each of which can function as a separate living unit. The floor plan of the house is 78 m². It also includes an auxiliary building used as a storage area, covering 132 m². The ground floor consists of: a living room, kitchen, two bedrooms, and a bathroom. An internal staircase leads to the first floor, which has the same floor plan as the ground floor. The attic is currently unfinished. The ground floor is heated by central gas heating, and an air conditioner is installed. The first floor is heated by a wood stove. The windows are PVC. In the yard, there is a garage, and behind the house, there is a garden and an orchard. A new roof was installed in 2010. Ideal for investors. The bus stop is just a minute away from the building, with proximity to the Church, school, kindergarten, and stores. Bonus nekretnine d.o.o. Osredak 4, Zagreb
